Name: Malvin`s Prehistoric Adventures
About the game: On these adventures Malvin has to visit all 26 eras before our time. The reason for that is a spirit of the time named Danny. He was supposed to do his homework during the year, but he didn`t. And now he really needs someone to help him. Visit the different eras Resist weather conditions Solve the puzzles Meet the spirits of the time, not all of whom will be happy to help And collect all artifacts, because Danny can`t do it alone
